Class PublicAccessUser

All Implemented Interfaces:
ExternalAccessSecurity
public abstract class PublicAccessUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalAccessSecurity

Abstract Implementation for all external access security. Public Access User Implementation.

Method Detail

authenticate

public abstract java.lang.String authenticate(java.lang.String identifier,
                                              char[] password,
                                              java.lang.String userType)
                                       throws AppException,
                                              InformationalException
The implementation of this method should validate the identifier and password and return the result of the validation. If the information is valid, the codetable code SecurityStatus.LOGIN should be returned.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user.
password - The password as array of characters.
userType - The type of external user.
Returns:
The status of the authentication in the form of a codetable code.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

authenticateUser

@Deprecated
public java.lang.String authenticateUser(java.lang.String identifier,
                                                    java.lang.String password,
                                                    java.lang.String userType)
                                  throws AppException,
                                         InformationalException
Deprecated. This method is deprecated in 6.0.5.0 Use autheticate method instead.

The implementation of this method should validate the identifier and password and return the result of the validation. If the information is valid, the codetable code SecurityStatus.LOGIN should be returned.

Specified by:
authenticateUser in interface ExternalAccessSecurity
Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the external user.
password - The encrypted password.
userType - The type of external user.
Returns:
The status of the authentication in the form of a codetable code.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

setPassword

public abstract void setPassword(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String hashedPassword)
                          throws AppException,
                                 InformationalException
Persist the new hash upgraded password. Do not commit or rollback, as the enclosing transaction will do the transaction management.

Parameters:
username - - Login user name.
hashedPassword - password hashed with current hash algorithm.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

upgradeSafePasswordValidation

public final boolean upgradeSafePasswordValidation(java.lang.String userName,
                                                   java.lang.String storedPasswordHash,
                                                   java.lang.String plaintextPassword)
                                            throws AppException,
                                                   InformationalException
Utility that compares the encrypted password, in password digest upgrade scenario will make sure it uses the appropriate digest before comparing.

Parameters:
userName - Logged In UserName.
storedPasswordHash - encrypted password.
plaintextPassword - password.
Returns:
boolean 'true' if comparison passes, 'false' otherwise.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
